Literature.Title: Tuning the antimicrobial pharmacophore to enable discovery of short lipopeptides with multiple modes of action.
Literature.Author: Fang Y, Zhong W, Wang Y, Xun T, Lin D, Liu W, Wang J, Lv L, Liu S, He J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:55% Hemolysis=62.5-125 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:65% Hemolysis=250 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=3.9µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=7.8µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 14053(MIC=15.6µg/ml)
